sentences.en: Capacious: Capable of containing a large quantity; spacious or roomy.
sentences.cn: 宽敞的: 能够容纳很大数量的; 宽敞的或宽松的.

sentences.en: Gradually his capacious chin encroached upon the borders of the white cravat.
sentences.cn: 他的广阔的下巴逐渐侵占了白领带的边界.

sentences.en: He has a capacious mind [ memory ].
sentences.cn: 他心胸开阔 [ 记忆力强 ].

sentences.en: He is perched on a large rawboned hunter, half covered by a capacious saddle.
sentences.cn: 他骑一匹瘦骨伶仃的大马, 用的鞍子很大,把马背遮掉了一半.

sentences.en: Here aperient profit , hinterland is capacious, situation is advantageous.
sentences.cn: 这里交通便利, 腹地广阔, 地理位置优越.

sentences.en: His forehead is capacious and high, but square and heavy and unpleasantly shining.
sentences.cn: 他脑门子又阔又高, 四四方方,显得很迟钝,而且亮晃晃的,叫人很不愉快.

sentences.en: In capacious and bright meeting hall beaming.
sentences.cn: 宽敞明亮的会议大厅里喜气洋洋.

sentences.en: North and south just can be cultivated, home, outside market prospect is capacious.
sentences.cn: 南北方都可种植, 国内 、 外市场前景广阔.

sentences.en: People is chickenshit, hart is capacious.
sentences.cn: 人是渺小的, 心灵是广阔的.

sentences.en: People is chickenshit, heart is capacious.
sentences.cn: 人是渺小的，心灵是广阔的。

sentences.en: Professor Johnson a man of capacious mind.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊教授是个心胸开阔的人.

sentences.en: The Ocean, that hospitable friend to the wretched, opened her capacious arms to receive Jones.
sentences.cn: 海洋, 这个不幸者的慷慨好客的朋友, 向琼斯张开了宽大的臂膀.

sentences.en: Within the vector space, enterprise is provided with capacious room to pilot requirements in many aspects.
sentences.cn: 在客户需求矢量空间中, 企业具有广阔的余地来对客户需求加以多方面的引导.
